title: Conservation in action
brief_description: Explains the program of the US Fish and Wildlife Service in conserving and managing national resources. Includes scenes showing habitat needs of salmon, waterfowl, buffalo, mountain goats and other forms of wildlife.
description: Explains the program of the US Fish and Wildlife Service in conserving and managing national resources. Includes scenes showing habitat needs of salmon, waterfowl, buffalo, mountain goats and other forms of wildlife.
